dt: {bc}a criminal who is associated with, usually exerts control over, and lives off the earnings of one or more prostitutes

et: probably akin to British dialect {it}pimp{/it} small bundle of sticks, Middle English {it}pymple{/it} papule, German {it}Pimpf{/it} young boy, kid, literally, little fart, {it}Pumpf, Pumps{/it} fart
shortdef: a criminal who is associated with, usually exerts control over, and lives off the earnings of one or more prostitutes

dt: {bc}to make use of often dishonorably for one's own gain or benefit
{bc}to customize and adorn (something, such as a car or apartment) in an {d_link|ostentatious|ostentatious} or {d_link|lavish|lavish:1} way

dt.t: Their backhoe had four spotlights on a bar above the cab, the same way kids {wi}pimped{/wi} their pick-up trucks, and together the four beams made a wide pool of halogen brightness.
This is a parallel world where teenagers {wi}pimp{/wi} out their motorboats, customizing them with dazzling LED lights and powerful stereo systems …

Foreign buyers—many of them anonymous—have poured cash into Miami's real-estate market for years. Think mansions priced at over $20 million, condos {wi}pimped{/wi} out with private rooftop pools, and spec houses with wild extras.

shortdef: to make use of often dishonorably for one's own gain or benefit
to customize and adorn (something, such as a car or apartment) in an ostentatious or lavish way —often used with out
